sentence.text: Using the larval startle response to the buzz of a predator (wasp), we examined PPI in wild-type flies and two mutants: an regulation of alternative mRNA splicing, via spliceosome mutant, which is implicated in Fragile X syndrome, and a centaurin gamma 1A (CenG1A) mutant, which is associated with GTPase, PH, ArfGAP, and ANK domains and implicated in autism.

entity.text: regulation of alternative mRNA splicing, via spliceosome
